org.apache.flink.runtime.jobmaster

类 JobMaster

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.flink.runtime.rpc.RpcEndpoint
      • org.apache.flink.runtime.rpc.FencedRpcEndpoint<JobMasterId>
        • org.apache.flink.runtime.jobmaster.JobMaster
  • 所有已实现的接口:
    CheckpointCoordinatorGateway, JobMasterGateway, FencedRpcGateway<JobMasterId>, RpcGateway

    public class JobMaster
extends FencedRpcEndpoint<JobMasterId>
implements JobMasterGateway
    JobMaster implementation. The job master is responsible for the execution of a single JobGraph.

    It offers the following methods as part of its rpc interface to interact with the JobMaster remotely:

    • updateTaskExecutionState(org.apache.flink.runtime.taskmanager.TaskExecutionState) updates the task execution state for given task

    • 方法详细资料

      • start

        public void start()
        从类复制的说明: RpcEndpoint
        Starts the rpc endpoint. This tells the underlying rpc server that the rpc endpoint is ready to process remote procedure calls. IMPORTANT: Whenever you override this method, call the parent implementation to enable rpc processing. It is advised to make the parent call last.
        覆盖:
        start 在类中 RpcEndpoint

      • start

        public java.util.concurrent.CompletableFuture<Acknowledge> start(JobMasterId newJobMasterId,
                                                                 Time timeout)
                                                          throws java.lang.Exception
        Start the rpc service and begin to run the job.
        参数:
        newJobMasterId - The necessary fencing token to run the job
        timeout - for the operation
        返回:
        Future acknowledge if the job could be started. Otherwise the future contains an exception
        抛出:
        java.lang.Exception

      • suspend

        public java.util.concurrent.CompletableFuture<Acknowledge> suspend(java.lang.Throwable cause,
                                                                   Time timeout)
        Suspending job, all the running tasks will be cancelled, and communication with other components will be disposed.

        Mostly job is suspended because of the leadership has been revoked, one can be restart this job by calling the start(JobMasterId, Time) method once we take the leadership back again.

        This method is executed asynchronously

        参数:
        cause - The reason of why this job been suspended.
        timeout - for this operation
        返回:
        Future acknowledge indicating that the job has been suspended. Otherwise the future contains an exception

      • postStop

        public void postStop()
              throws java.lang.Exception
        Suspend the job and shutdown all other services including rpc.
        覆盖:
        postStop 在类中 RpcEndpoint
        抛出:
        java.lang.Exception - if an error occurs. The exception is returned as result of the termination future.

      • requestNextInputSplit

        public java.util.concurrent.CompletableFuture<SerializedInputSplit> requestNextInputSplit(JobVertexID vertexID,
                                                                                          ExecutionAttemptID executionAttempt)
        从接口复制的说明: JobMasterGateway
        Requests the next input split for the ExecutionJobVertex. The next input split is sent back to the sender as a SerializedInputSplit message.
        指定者:
        requestNextInputSplit 在接口中 JobMasterGateway
        参数:
        vertexID - The job vertex id
        executionAttempt - The execution attempt id
        返回:
        The future of the input split. If there is no further input split, will return an empty object.

      • requestPartitionState

        public java.util.concurrent.CompletableFuture<ExecutionState> requestPartitionState(IntermediateDataSetID intermediateResultId,
                                                                                    ResultPartitionID resultPartitionId)
        从接口复制的说明: JobMasterGateway
        Requests the current state of the partition. The state of a partition is currently bound to the state of the producing execution.
        指定者:
        requestPartitionState 在接口中 JobMasterGateway
        参数:
        intermediateResultId - The execution attempt ID of the task requesting the partition state.
        resultPartitionId - The partition ID of the partition to request the state of.
        返回:
        The future of the partition state

      • scheduleOrUpdateConsumers

        public java.util.concurrent.CompletableFuture<Acknowledge> scheduleOrUpdateConsumers(ResultPartitionID partitionID,
                                                                                     Time timeout)
        从接口复制的说明: JobMasterGateway
        Notifies the JobManager about available data for a produced partition.

        There is a call to this method for each ExecutionVertex instance once per produced ResultPartition instance, either when first producing data (for pipelined executions) or when all data has been produced (for staged executions).

        The JobManager then can decide when to schedule the partition consumers of the given session.

        指定者:
        scheduleOrUpdateConsumers 在接口中 JobMasterGateway
        参数:
        partitionID - The partition which has already produced data
        timeout - before the rpc call fails
        返回:
        Future acknowledge of the schedule or update operation

        指定者:
        notifyKvStateRegistered 在接口中 JobMasterGateway
        参数:

        keyGroupRange - Key group range the KvState instance belongs to.
        registrationName - Name under which the KvState has been registered.
        kvStateId - ID of the registered KvState instance.
        kvStateServerAddress - Server address where to find the KvState instance.

      • suspendExecution

        private Acknowledge suspendExecution(java.lang.Throwable cause)
        Suspending job, all the running tasks will be cancelled, and communication with other components will be disposed.

        Mostly job is suspended because of the leadership has been revoked, one can be restart this job by calling the start(JobMasterId, Time) method once we take the leadership back again.

        参数:
        cause - The reason of why this job been suspended.
